creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: PL hand with a clown finger puppet on index finger and other fingers in a fist, holding a small dagger with a rose at the top end
markings: below image in pencil: A.P. | LRC stamp: KENJI NAKAHASHI / NEW YORK
medium: Photo-etching, impressed blank plate on photo lithograph, on paper
signed: below image in pencil: \"Pierrot, Rose and Dirk\" / K. Nakahashi | LRC in pencil: 1978
title: Pierrot, Rose and Dirk
